segments.text: I came to this lab to have my blood drawn .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You are in the right place . Roll up your left sleeve and have a seat .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What am I being tested for ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your doctor wants to know what your white blood cell count is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What does my white blood cell count tell him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Usually if your white count is off , the doctor suspects an infection .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is only a pin prick . I have to put this tourniquet on your arm to make the vein easier to find .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is that my blood going into that tube ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That blood that just filled the tube is all that I needed . Thanks for coming in !
segments.speaker: S2
